price: 56. Mpe tosilaki kolakisa ye bilembo bia biso nyoso, kasi aboyaki kondima.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
